name: curriculum
description: Mon CV en HTML généré avec EJS → déploiement automatique sur GitHub Pages

scripts.deploy: npm run build && git add . && git commit -m "Update CV - $(date +'%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')" && git push
scripts.force-deploy: npm run build && git add . && git commit -m "Force update CV - $(date +'%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')" && git push -f origin main

author: Laurent Tempier
